Madsen is a business man who buys and sells antiques, including classical sculptures that no one loves anymore but him. predictable, campy, bad special effects. it has a TV-movie feeling to it. the voices work nicely though and i really liked those black cat's animations.

The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, they do not realize that what was going on with them. Just when you think it's all clear and danger-free there is something that catches up with everyone and wants to kill everyone.
Actors: James Master, Antony Souter

This film was clearly written down according to parody or adoration of classic fairy tales like Cinderella and Sleeping beauty which are themselves clearly parodying mythology.
